title: How to find my best suitable field in information technology - Quora

response.answer_text: Here are some recommendations on Software Engineering: Think of an app or web site, that is an analytical quality, which is important at the planning and analysis stages. Draw diagrams, showing the way your software will work. Then, try to code, write an app or plain web site with several web pages, you will understand the way IT stuff works in root. After that, try to code something with interface, so you may find yourself in design: css. Later, try to publish your product, at this stage you will see technology obstacles. Maybe you will like tuning and configuring. Finally, think of weak points of your work, ask your friends to test and then test and try to break your own app. Maybe you are good in testing. Then if you can sell it or attract someone so you can write something else, this is a IT marketing field. You may also teach someone to do the same, and find yourself as a an instructor. Try and be curious on knowledge. Good luck
